metadata.title: VietKieuConnect — Quality Dental Care in Vietnam
metadata.description: Connect with verified dental clinics in Vietnam. Save thousands on dental treatments with trusted Việt Kiều reviews.

hero.slide1Subtitle: Connect with verified clinics, get transparent quotes, and travel with confidence. Trusted by thousands of Việt Kiều.
hero.slide2Subtitle: Every clinic is vetted by our team. Read real patient reviews, compare ratings, and choose with confidence.
hero.slide3Subtitle: From your first consultation to your final appointment — we guide you every step of the way.

trustBadges.verifiedDesc: Every clinic vetted by our team

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get quality dental care in 3 simple steps
howItWorks.step1Desc: Upload your X-rays or dental photos and describe the treatment you need.
howItWorks.step1Detail1: Upload dental X-rays or photos directly through our secure platform
howItWorks.step1Detail2: Describe your treatment needs and dental history in detail
howItWorks.step1Detail3: Provide travel dates and budget to help clinics prepare accurate quotes
howItWorks.step2Desc: Receive transparent quotes from verified clinics. Compare prices and reviews.
howItWorks.step2Detail1: Receive detailed treatment plans from multiple verified clinics
howItWorks.step2Detail2: Compare pricing, clinic ratings, and real patient reviews
howItWorks.step2Detail3: Ask questions directly to clinic representatives before deciding
howItWorks.step3Desc: Choose your clinic, book your appointment, and travel with confidence.
howItWorks.step3Detail1: Book your appointment with your chosen clinic instantly
howItWorks.step3Detail2: Receive confirmation with detailed appointment information
howItWorks.step3Detail3: Travel to Vietnam with peace of mind knowing everything is arranged

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.s1Body: VietKieuConnect is a dental tourism facilitation platform that connects overseas Vietnamese (Việt Kiều) with verified dental clinics in Vietnam. We act as an intermediary — we do NOT provide medical examinations, diagnoses, or treatments. All clinical services are provided directly by the partner clinics listed on our platform.
terms.s2Body: VietKieuConnect serves as a facilitator only. We provide general information about dental clinics, help coordinate appointments, and offer communication channels. We do not guarantee treatment outcomes, clinic availability, or the accuracy of pricing information provided by third-party clinics. Users are responsible for verifying all clinical information directly with their chosen provider.
terms.s3Body: By using VietKieuConnect, you agree that: (a) you will verify all medical information independently with qualified dental professionals; (b) you acknowledge that dental treatment outcomes vary by individual; (c) you will provide accurate personal and health information when requesting consultations; (d) you understand that VietKieuConnect is not liable for the quality, safety, or outcome of any treatment performed by partner clinics.
terms.s4Body: VietKieuConnect, its officers, employees, and agents shall not be held liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from: dental treatments performed by partner clinics, travel-related incidents, communication errors, or reliance on information published on this platform. Our total liability is limited to the coordination fees paid by the user.
terms.s5Body: All content on VietKieuConnect, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of VietKieuConnect or its content suppliers and is protected by international copyright laws. Unauthorized reproduction or distribution is prohibited.
terms.s6Body: We reserve the right to update these Terms of Service at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. Continued use of the platform after changes constitutes acceptance of the revised terms.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.s1Body: We collect information you provide directly, such as your name, email address, phone number, and consultation preferences. We do NOT collect, store, or process Protected Health Information (PHI) such as medical records, X-rays, or treatment history. All medical communications occur directly between you and the dental clinic through third-party channels (WhatsApp, Zalo, etc.).
privacy.s2Body: Your information is used to: (a) facilitate clinic consultations and appointments; (b) communicate platform updates; (c) improve our services; (d) comply with legal obligations. We do not sell, rent, or share your personal data with third parties for marketing purposes.
privacy.s3Body: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal data, including encryption in transit and at rest, access controls, and regular security audits. However, no internet transmission is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacy.s4Body: Our platform may contain links to third-party websites and services (clinic websites, WhatsApp, Zalo, Facebook). We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these external services. We encourage you to review their privacy policies before sharing personal information.
privacy.s5Body: You have the right to: (a) access your personal data; (b) request correction of inaccurate data; (c) request deletion of your data; (d) withdraw consent for data processing. To exercise these rights, contact us at support@vietkieuconnect.com.

disclaimer.title: Medical Disclaimer
disclaimer.highlight: VietKieuConnect is NOT a healthcare provider. We do not provide medical advice, diagnoses, or treatment recommendations. Always consult with a qualified dental professional for personalized medical advice.
disclaimer.s1Body: All information provided on VietKieuConnect — including clinic descriptions, service listings, treatment information, and pricing — is for general informational purposes only. This information does not constitute medical advice and should not be relied upon as a substitute for professional dental consultation. We strongly recommend consulting with your local dentist before making any treatment decisions.
disclaimer.s2Body: Using VietKieuConnect does not create a provider-patient relationship between you and VietKieuConnect, or between you and any clinic listed on our platform until you formally engage with that clinic. VietKieuConnect is a facilitator that helps connect you with dental clinics — we do not participate in clinical decisions.
disclaimer.s3Body: Each dental clinic listed on VietKieuConnect is an independent healthcare provider with its own licenses, staff, and clinical protocols. VietKieuConnect verifies basic credentials but does not supervise, control, or guarantee the quality of care provided. Treatment outcomes, complications, and patient satisfaction are the sole responsibility of the treating clinic.
disclaimer.s4Body: Dental treatment in Vietnam may differ from standards in your home country. Regulatory frameworks, materials used, and clinical practices may vary. Patients should research and understand these differences before proceeding. VietKieuConnect is not liable for any adverse outcomes arising from international dental treatment.

disclaimerBanner.text: VietKieuConnect is a dental tourism facilitator, not a healthcare provider. Information on this site is for reference only.
